data.title: Midlothian Optometry
data.meta_description: Serving Richmond and Midlothian, Virginia as well as the surrounding areas, Dr. Heather Weaver provides comprehensive eye care for all members of your family. Call (804) 419-6671 to schedule an appointment.
data.text:
About Us

Our mission

Our mission is to provide the best eye care possible to the people of Midlothian and Richmond, Virginia. We are dedicated to providing personal, friendly service to everyone who walks through our door. We strive to accommodate all patients, with flexible office hours that include Saturdays.

Get in touch

To make an appointment, please call our office at (804) 419-6671 or submit the form below to send us a message. We strive to accommodate most patients with appointment availability, including some same day and walk-in appointments, as well as Saturday appointments.
